text: Rhynia is a genus of Early Devonian fossil land plants. Only one species is known, R. gwynne-vaughanii. The fossils are the sporophyte generation of a vascular plant. Rhynia had anatomical features more advanced than those of the bryophytes. ==Related pages== * Horneophyton, a fossil non-vascular plant similar to Rhynia ==References== Category:Vascular plants Category:Fossil plants Category:Extinct plants
title: Rhynia
